column5: Went out this past Sunday with Paul Chiasson from my sponsor , Interstate batteries, Paul wanted to gain some info on Smallmouth , especially on drop-shotting, and tubes, we had cold but fun day, and while the bass were a bit picky we still boated more than a dozen, also Paul caught a really nice pike in Cooks bay, fish can from 20-35 ftw , all were released.
Very impressive Mark and Paul. Nice pike but those smallies are beauts! Were they mostly caught drop-shotting? Very nice, thanks for taking the time to post.
Nice catch mark!!!!! you da man..  ...very nice sized simcoe fat smallies....cheers
Lots of nice smallies in K Bay!

Looks like paul is saying to himself... please dont fart please dont fart.... either that or the camera went off when his eyes were closed...  Sounds like a great outing!!  Congrats on some beauties!  G.
real nice fish, thanks for sharing.

Thanks guy's and Roy it was a 50/50 split drop-shot tubes, pike hit a Mizmo tube, funny day one spot bass preffered the drop, yet another they showed a preference with tubes, Paul caught his first drop-shot bass so he was quite happy.now that I have this picture thing figuired out I can show more pics-I enjoy looking at the multi-specie pics by the members.
Sorry Steve I forgot how sensitive some people are around here when you mention a spot!  Did you admonish Mark for mentioning Cooks Bay?
Nice Smallies! Some real fall time footballs! Nice pike as well
